comments.body: Does it really matter? I see in the existsSync at the link you pointed the first statement is validation of the path under try catch block..

Yes, the expensive part is https://github.com/nodejs/node/blob/9da241b600182a9ff400f6efc24f11a6303c27f7/lib/fs.js#L948.  In local testing, testing for 1000 non-existent pipe drops from 69ms to 7ms on Windows and from 20ms to 3ms on Linux.  

AFAICT, `validatePath` basically just confirms the input is a non-null string.
